url.description: URL for file upload. To upload file, Http PUT request with header 'x-ms-blob-type' : 'BlockBlob' can be issued.

file_type.description:
Type of the file uploaded.
            #Valid Values:
            * MerchantSKUs
            * Inventory
            * Price

received.description: Time when file was acknowledged by Jet.com

status.description:
Status of processing hy Jet.com.
            #Valid Values:
            * Acknowledged - File was accepted by Jet.com for processing.
            * Processed successfully - All data in file was processed successfully.
            * Processed with errors - There were errors while processing the file.  They are reported in 'details' field.

error_count.description: Number of errors encountered when processing the file.

error_url.description: Url to a file with errors.

items.description: Error description with location in file.

jet_file_id.description: An identification assigned by Jet to track the file.  This identification retrieves the file upload details including processing errors
